properties.address: 2 Glenginnet road, Barr, South Ayrshire KA26 9TU
properties.description: Barr Community Shop and Cafe is a community-owned Welcome Space in the village of Barr in South Ayrshire. Anyone is welcome during opening hours for a cup of tea and a chat in our community cafe. We support the community by providing a shop, cafe and Post Office. It is run by paid staff and volunteers.
properties.title: Barr Community Shop and Cafe
